title.value: Production technology for a planting material of ball-rooted fruit crops
Технология производства посадочного материала плодовых культур с закрытой корневой системой

person.name: Drabudko, N.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Fruit Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the technology which positions technological operations at cultivation of a planting material of ball-rooted fruit crops. The flow chart of cultivation process of ball-rooted seedlings of fruit crops includes the following main operations:  soil preparation for mother plantations planting, mother plantations planting, mother plantations handing, green cuttings procurement, technological process of propagation by herbaceous cuttings, cuttings handling, replanting and handling of rooted cuttings, a budding, proper care of plants after budding, container plants fertilizing, a winter storage  of a ball-rooted planting material and ball-rooted planting material preparation for its sale. The developed technology application will allow to receive 330 thousand unites of green cuttings from 1 hectare of mother plantation, not less 320 unites of the rooted green cuttings from 1 square meter of a greenhouse, an exit of 90% of standard seedlings from a total quantity with the subsequent 100% survival after planting in the orchard.
